content: Create a markdown table of 5 tallest buildings

| Building Name       | City           | Height (m) |
|---------------------|----------------|------------|
| Burj Khalifa        | Dubai          | 828        |
| Shanghai Tower      | Shanghai       | 632        |
| Abraj Al-Bait Clock | Mecca          | 601        |
| Ping An Finance     | Shenzhen       | 599        |
| Lotte World Tower   | Seoul          | 555        |
Add a column for Year Built

| Building Name       | City           | Height (m) | Year Built |
|---------------------|----------------|------------|------------|
| Burj Khalifa        | Dubai          | 828        | 2010       |
| Shanghai Tower      | Shanghai       | 632        | 2015       |
| Abraj Al-Bait Clock | Mecca          | 601        | 2012       |
| Ping An Finance     | Shenzhen       | 599        | 2017       |
| Lotte World Tower   | Seoul          | 555        | 2016       |
Remove Height in feet and add a column for Floors

| Building Name       | City           | Height (m) | Floors | Year Built |
|---------------------|----------------|------------|--------|------------|
| Burj Khalifa        | Dubai          | 828        | 163    | 2010       |
| Shanghai Tower      | Shanghai       | 632        | 128    | 2015       |
| Abraj Al-Bait Clock | Mecca          | 601        | 120    | 2012       |
| Ping An Finance     | Shenzhen       | 599        | 115    | 2017       |
| Lotte World Tower   | Seoul          | 555        | 123    | 2016       |
